Adhokshaj
1. Authentication will happen over HTTPS
2. After auth, a token is generated, and shared with user
after that, there is no need to login
as long as next party is able to prove that they know the token
each session will have a session ID


1
as soon as same session ID comes from different IP, session expires


1
